pkgmetadata.longdescription: enum --- support for enumerations========================================An enumeration is a set of symbolic names (members) bound to unique, constantvalues. Within an enumeration, the members can be compared by identity, andthe enumeration itself can be iterated over. from enum import Enum class Fruit(Enum): apple = 1 banana = 2 orange = 3 list(Fruit) # [<Fruit.apple: 1>, <Fruit.banana: 2>, <Fruit.orange: 3>] len(Fruit) # 3 Fruit.banana # <Fruit.banana: 2> Fruit['banana'] # <Fruit.banana: 2> Fruit(2) # <Fruit.banana: 2> Fruit.banana is Fruit['banana'] is Fruit(2) # True Fruit.banana.name # 'banana' Fruit.banana.value # 2Repository and Issue Tracker at https://bitbucket.org/stoneleaf/enum34.
